original: Nahetuṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With non-cause as condition, a non-cause that is not to be abandoned by development arises, a dhamma that is not to be abandoned by development. (In brief.) With cause as condition, three; with predominance as condition, three; … with non-hindrance as condition, three.

original: Nanahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte🔽pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum na na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe sahajāte  pañca pe avigate pañca
translated: With a non-cause that is not to be abandoned by seeing, a non-cause that is not to be abandoned by seeing arises, a dhamma that is not to be abandoned by seeing. (In brief.) With cause as condition, one; … with non-hindrance as condition, one.🔽With a non-cause that is not to be abandoned by development, a non-cause that is not to be abandoned by development arises, a dhamma that is not to be abandoned by development. (In brief.) With cause as condition, three; with object as condition, three; … with co-nascence as condition, five; … with non-hindrance as condition, five.

original: Nanahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
